title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated with exceptional critical acclaim (86 Metacritic, 8.6 IMDb rating from 26K+ votes). Features acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan on the prestigious Apple TV platform.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: A prestige drama on HBO with a strong 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45K votes. Stars well-known actor Mark Ruffalo and comes from 'Mare of Easttown' creator Brad Ingelsby.
